# ti-target-connection-manager



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute              | Description                                                                                                                                                | Type      | Default     |
| --------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `activeConfiguration` | `active-configuration` | Indicates regular USB-HID support mode only.  Add this attribute to use usb-hid ports only and not regular usb serial ports.                               | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `autoConnect`         | `auto-connect`         | Indicates if the connection manager should automatically connect to the target on application startup, or if it should wait for the app to call connect(). | `boolean` | `false`     |
